revised_title: A Three-Dimensional Model of Molecular Configuration and Valency
tldr: The author proposes a hypothesis that the arrangement of electrons in atoms and the mechanism of chemical bonding can be explained by considering the electrons as revolving in smaller circles parallel to an equatorial plane. This hypothesis suggests that electro-negative and electro-positive atoms have different electron pathways, and that the formation of molecules, such as hydrogen, can be explained by the interaction of these electron pathways.
